DPRK government cultural delegation leaves for China
    Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government cultural delegation headed by Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, left here today to visit China.
 The delegation was seen off at Pyongyang railway station by Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the committee, and Feng Zhiyuan, cultural councillor of the Chinese embassy here.
